title: Ear, Nose and Throat (Otolaryngology) | VMFH
description: Find advanced ear, nose and throat (ENT) care from the otolaryngologists at Virginia Mason Franciscan Health.
cleaned_text: The [otolaryngologists](https://www.vmfh.org/find-a-doctor/m/franciscan-medical-group%257Cvirginia-mason-medical-center/otolaryngology) at Virginia Mason Franciscan Health are dedicated to providing you with complete care for conditions affecting the head and neck region. Our specialists offer advanced health care for ear, nose and throat (ENT) problems for patients of all ages. From earaches to hearing loss, sore throats to sinusitis, our team is equipped to address your otolaryngology needs. Otolaryngology at Virginia Mason Franciscan Health is composed of the following subspecialties. Providing ear, nose and throat care for a range of conditions. Targeted oncology care for cancers of the throat, larynx, nose, sinuses and mouth. [Neurotology and skull-based surgery](/content/vmfhorg/en/our-services/ear-nose-and-throat-otolaryngology/neurotology-skull-based-surgery.html) Neurotologists are surgeons trained to use both medical and surgical interventions to treat diseases affecting the ears and hearing system, balance (vestibular) system, and lateral skull base and temporal bone. Schedule an appointment with a Virginia Mason Franciscan Health ENT specialist today to take the next step in your health journey.
